verses.verse: וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh now these שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot Now these [are] the names הַשְּׁבָטִ֑ים <WH7626> hash-she-va-Tim; of the tribes מִקְצֵ֣ה <WH7097> mik-Tzeh end צָפ֡וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah From the north אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יַ֣ד <WH3027> yad to the coast דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> de-rech- of the way חֶתְלֹ֣ן׀ <WH2855> chet-Lon of Hethlon לְֽבוֹא־ <WH935> le-Vo- as one goeth חֲמָ֡ת <WH2574> cha-Mat to Hamath חֲצַ֣ר cha-Tzar עֵינָן֩ <WH2704> 'ei-Nan Hazarenan גְּב֨וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul the border דַּמֶּ֤שֶׂק <WH1834> dam-Me-sek of Damascus צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah northward אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יַ֣ד <WH3027> yad to the coast חֲמָ֔ת <WH2574> cha-Mat, of Hamath וְהָיוּ־ <WH1961> ve-ha-yu- running ל֧וֹ <WH99999> lo פְאַת־ <WH6285> fe-'at- for these are his sides קָדִ֛ים <WH6921> ka-Dim east הַיָּ֖ם <WH3220> hai-Yam [and] west דָּ֥ן <WH1835> dan [portion for] Dan אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <WH5921> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul And by the border דָּ֗ן <WH1835> Dan, of Dan מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛ים <WH6921> ka-Dim from the east עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah unto the west אָשֵׁ֥ר <WH836> 'a-Sher [portion for] Asher אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <WH5921> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul And by the border אָשֵׁ֗ר <WH836> 'a-Sher, of Asher מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛ימָה <WH6921> ka-Di-mah from the east וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah even unto the west נַפְתָּלִ֥י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li [portion for] Naphtali אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <WH5921> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul And by the border נַפְתָּלִ֗י <WH5321> naf-ta-Li, of Naphtali מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛מָה <WH6921> ka-Di-mah from the east עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah unto the west מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh [portion for] Manasseh אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <WH5921> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul And by the border מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> me-nash-Sheh, of Manasseh מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛מָה <WH6921> ka-Di-mah from the east עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah unto the west אֶפְרַ֥יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim [portion for] Ephraim אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <WH5921> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul And by the border אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛ים <WH6921> ka-Dim from the east וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah even unto the west רְאוּבֵ֥ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven [portion for] Reuben אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַ֣ל׀ <WH5921> ve-'Al Beside גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul And by the border רְאוּבֵ֗ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven, of Reuben מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֛ים <WH6921> ka-Dim from the east עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side יָ֖מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah unto the west יְהוּדָ֥ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah [portion for] Judah אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. a

וְעַל֙ <WH5921> ve-'Al and by גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul And by the border יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah מִפְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֖ים <WH6921> ka-Dim from the east עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side יָ֑מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah; unto the west תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become הַתְּרוּמָ֣ה <WH8641> hat-te-ru-Mah shall be the offering אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'asher- which תָּרִ֡ימוּ <WH7311> ta-Ri-mu which ye shall offer חֲמִשָּׁה֩ <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah of five וְעֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֜לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand רֹ֗חַב <WH7341> Ro-chav, [reeds in] breadth וְאֹ֜רֶךְ <WH753> ve-'O-rech and [in] length כְּאַחַ֤ד <WH259> ke-'a-Chad as one הַחֲלָקִים֙ <WH2506> ha-cha-la-Kim of the [other] parts מִפְּאַ֤ת <WH6285> mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֙ימָה֙ <WH6921> ka-Di-mah from the east עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against פְּאַת־ <WH6285> pe-'at- side יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah, unto the west וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <WH4720> ham-mik-Dash and the sanctuary בְּתוֹכֽוֹ׃ <WH8432> be-to-Cho. shall be in the midst

הַתְּרוּמָ֕ה <WH8641> hat-te-ru-Mah The oblation אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher you תָּרִ֖ימוּ <WH7311> ta-Ri-mu that ye shall offer לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD אֹ֗רֶךְ <WH753> 'O-rech, in length חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah [shall be] of five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> ve-Ro-chav in breadth עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret and of ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> 'a-la-Fim. thousand

וּ֠לְאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> u-le-'El-leh another תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh become תְרֽוּמַת־ <WH8641> te-ru-mat- oblation הַקֹּדֶשׁ֮ <WH6944> hak-ko-Desh shall be [this] holy לַכֹּֽהֲנִים֒ <WH3548> lak-ko-ha-Nim And for them [even] for the priests צָפ֜וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah toward the north חֲמִשָּׁ֧ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah five וְעֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֗לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, thousand וְיָ֙מָּה֙ <WH3220> ve-Yam-mah [in length] and toward the west רֹ֚חַב <WH7341> Ro-chav in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וְקָדִ֗ימָה <WH6921> ve-ka-Di-mah, and toward the east רֹ֚חַב <WH7341> Ro-chav in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וְנֶ֕גְבָּה <WH5045> ve-Neg-bah and toward the south אֹ֕רֶךְ <WH753> 'O-rech in length חֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah five וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אָ֑לֶף <WH505> 'A-lef; thousand וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become מִקְדַּשׁ־ <WH4720> mik-dash- and the sanctuary יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God בְּתוֹכֽוֹ׃ <WH8432> be-to-Cho. shall be in the midst

לַכֹּהֲנִ֤ים <WH3548> lak-ko-ha-Nim [It shall be] for the priests הַֽמְקֻדָּשׁ֙ <WH6942> ham-kud-Dash that are sanctified מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> mib-be-Nei of the sons צָד֔וֹק <WH6659> tza-Dok, of Zadok אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who שָׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> sha-me-Ru which have kept מִשְׁמַרְתִּ֑י <WH4931> mish-mar-Ti; my charge אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not תָע֗וּ <WH8582> ta-'U, which went not astray בִּתְעוֹת֙ <WH8582> bit-'Ot went astray בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher who תָּע֖וּ <WH8582> ta-'U went astray הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim. as the Levites ס sa-Mek

וְהָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> ve-ha-ye-Tah become לָהֶ֧ם la-Hem תְּרוּמִיָּ֛ה <WH8642> te-ru-mi-Yah And [this] oblation מִתְּרוּמַ֥ת <WH8641> mit-te-ru-Mat that is offered הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the land קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh shall be unto them a thing most קָדָשִׁ֑ים <WH6944> ka-da-Shim; holy אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- by גְּב֖וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul by the border הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> hal-vi-Yim. of the Levites

וְהַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim, the Levites לְעֻמַּת֙ <WH5980> le-'um-Mat And over against גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul the border הַכֹּהֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim, of the priests חֲמִשָּׁ֨ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah [shall have] five וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> 'e-lef thousand אֹ֔רֶךְ <WH753> 'O-rech, in length וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> ve-Ro-chav in breadth עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret and ten אֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim; thousand כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֹ֗רֶךְ <WH753> 'O-rech, all the length חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah [shall be] five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, thousand וְרֹ֖חַב <WH7341> ve-Ro-chav and the breadth עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret ten אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> 'a-la-Fim. thousand

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- shall not יִמְכְּר֣וּ <WH4376> yim-ke-Ru And they shall not sell מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu, any וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo or יָמֵ֛ר <WH4171> ya-Mer of it neither exchange וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not; יַעֲבוּר ya-'a-vur כיַעֲבִ֖יר <WH5674> ya-'a-Vir alienate קרֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> re-Shit the firstfruits הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; of the land כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> Ko-desh for [it is] holy לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto the LORD

וַחֲמֵ֨שֶׁת <WH2568> va-cha-Me-shet And the five אֲלָפִ֜ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand הַנּוֹתָ֣ר <WH3498> han-no-Tar that are left בָּרֹ֗חַב <WH7341> ba-Ro-chav, in the breadth עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> pe-Nei over against חֲמִשָּׁ֤ה <WH2568> cha-mish-Shah the five וְעֶשְׂרִים֙ <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, thousand חֹֽל־ <WH2455> chol- shall be a profane ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu he לָעִ֔יר <WH5892> la-'Ir, [place] for the city לְמוֹשָׁ֖ב <WH4186> le-mo-Shav for dwelling וּלְמִגְרָ֑שׁ <WH4054> u-le-mig-Rash; and for suburbs וְהָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-ye-Tah become הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir and the city; בְּתֹוכֹה be-to-choh כבְּתֹוכֹֽו׃ <WH8432> be-to-Cho. hope ק

וְאֵלֶּה֮ <WH428> ve-'el-Leh another מִדּוֹתֶיהָ֒ <WH4060> mid-do-tei-Ha And these [shall be] the measures פְּאַ֣ת <WH6285> pe-'At side צָפ֗וֹן <WH6828> tza-Fon, thereof the north חֲמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh and five מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> me-'Ot hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba-'at four אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וּפְאַת־ <WH6285> u-fe-'at- side נֶ֕גֶב <WH5045> Ne-gev and the south חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh and five; חֲמֵשׁ <WH2568> cha-mesh fif כמֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba-'at four אֲלָפִ֑ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim; thousand וּמִפְּאַ֣ת <WH6285> u-mip-pe-'At side קָדִ֗ים <WH6921> ka-Dim, and on the east חֲמֵ֤שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh and five מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> me-'Ot hundred וְאַרְבַּ֣עַת <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba-'at four אֲלָפִ֔ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim, thousand וּפְאַת־ <WH6285> u-fe-'at- side יָ֕מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah and the west חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> cha-Mesh fif מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred וְאַרְבַּ֥עַת <WH702> ve-'ar-Ba-'at four אֲלָפִֽים׃ <WH505> 'a-la-Fim. thousand

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become מִגְרָשׁ֮ <WH4054> mig-Rash And the suburbs לָעִיר֒ <WH5892> la-'Ir of the city צָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah shall be toward the north חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim and fifty וּמָאתַ֔יִם <WH3967> u-ma-Ta-yim, two hundred וְנֶ֖גְבָּה <WH5045> ve-Neg-bah and toward the south חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim and fifty וּמָאתָ֑יִם <WH3967> u-ma-Ta-yim; two hundred וְקָדִ֙ימָה֙ <WH6921> ve-ka-Di-mah and toward the east חֲמִשִּׁ֣ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim and fifty וּמָאתַ֔יִם <WH3967> u-ma-Ta-yim, two hundred וְיָ֖מָּה <WH3220> ve-Yam-mah and toward the west חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> cha-mish-Shim and fifty וּמָאתָֽיִם׃ <WH3967> u-ma-Ta-yim. two hundred

וְהַנּוֹתָ֨ר <WH3498> ve-han-no-Tar And the residue בָּאֹ֜רֶךְ <WH753> ba-'O-rech in length לְעֻמַּ֣ת׀ <WH5980> le-'um-Mat over against תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> te-ru-Mat the oblation הַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh, of the holy עֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <WH6235> 'a-Se-ret [portion shall be] ten אֲלָפִ֤ים <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand קָדִ֙ימָה֙ <WH6921> ka-Di-mah eastward וַעֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <WH6235> va-'a-Se-ret and ten אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> 'a-la-Fim thousand יָ֔מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah, westward וְהָיָ֕ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become לְעֻמַּ֖ת <WH5980> le-'um-Mat and it shall be over against תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> te-ru-Mat the oblation הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh; of the holy וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> ve-ha-ye-Tah become; תְבוּאָתֹה te-vu-'a-toh כתְבֽוּאָתֹו֙ <WH8393> te-vu-'a-To ark קלְלֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> le-Le-chem, thereof shall be for food לְעֹבְדֵ֖י <WH5647> le-'oe-Dei unto them that serve הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> ha-'Ir. the city
